title: AutoPlay Videos on websites not being blocked
content:
On major websites such as espn.com, when on a webpage with a video, the video autoplays despite the settings area of my browser is set up as block audio and video as the default for all websites. espn.com is not listed in the area below that setting for exceptions.

It is both distracting and annoying since this problem has been ongoing for months despite using the latest browser and triple-checking my settings to ensure my settings are properly selected.

I want to come to any page with a video and be forced to press the play button if I want to view it and not have to click in the box to stop it. Thankfully there is no problem with the audio as it is always muted, but I want the full desire of block audio and video to be enabled.

Thank you.
creator: montoyaclemmons

title: Google Maps 3D stopped working
content:
I've used Google Maps 3d on this machine before. I don't use it all the time. Not sure at what point it stopped working, but sometime in the last 3-6 months.

Windows 10 Pro version 22H2 Firefox version 124.0 (64-bit) Hardware Acceleration is turned ON webgl.enable-renderer-query=TRUE webgl.enable-webgl2=TRUE webGL.disable=FALSE WebGL 2 Driver Renderer=Google Inc. (Intel) -- ANGLE (Intel, Intel(R) HD Graphics 4000 Direct3D11 vs_5_0 ps_5_0, D3D11-10.18.10.5059)

Google Maps shows the Global View as greyed out so I'm unable to use 3D. Did a test on https://get.webgl.org/. I see the spinning cube.

Any suggestions?
creator: lisach

title: Adres çubuğundaki siteleri silme
content: Adres çubuğunda orada olmasını istemediğim siteler var bu siteleri oradan nasıl silebilirim ve kendi istediğim siteleri nasıl adres çubuğuna eklerim ?
creator: yavuzyazimci

title: Firefox for mac upgrade 124 (64 bit) not working
content:
Hello -

I just upgraded Firefox on my Mac Mini M2 (2023) to version 124 (64 bit). When I start up Firefox it starts (I see Firefox in the top menu bar) but it will not open a session window. In addition, the top menu bar is in an inactive state (i.e. the words are in grey instead of black). It seems to be in a partially open state.

I have tried (1) waiting to see if that fixes things and (2) a cold boot of the computer. Both things did not work.

Thank you very much for your help.

Don
creator: don.ellithorpe

title: Change file browser Firefox uses for displaying downloads
content:
I'm using Kubuntu which uses the Dolphin file manager as default. When I download a file and use the download status icon at top right to check on a downloaded file "Show in folder" it comes up in Thunar.

A minor thing and it is not stopping me from doing the intended action, but the change throws me even so given I rarely use Thunar. I'm not sure it even gets installed with Kubuntu, but it has some special tools Dolphin does not have so I put it on my machine.

Any way to make Firefox show the location of the downloaded file using Dolphin? Didn't find anything where I looked using about:config
creator: tudza

title: da una settimana molti siti web non si aprono piu' con altri motori di ricerca si aprono
content: buongiorno, da circa una settimana molti siti non si aprono piu' con Firefox, con altri motori di ricerca si, io che uso regolarmente Firefox mi trovo in difficolta', grazie saluti

title: Gmai/Google' account are stuck
content: Gmail and my Google account are stuck on the help center pages. I can't sign in or out and can't reach my mail. Both work fine in other browsers. I tried the "about:support" page with no results.
creator: birancons

title: Firefox won't reconnect to the Internet if it is started without a connection
content: If Firefox is started without an Internet connection on Linux (can happen on start up when the wifi isn't connected yet), the browser continues to refuse to connect to all webpages (unable to connect). It needs to be killed and restarted to work. Offline mode is not ticked. If offline mode is manually ticked and unticked it makes no difference. Ticking offline mode and retrying doesn't work and offline mode is automatically unticked. In the current version of OpenSuSE this is happening on every restart (possibly wifi is getting started a bit later), and it is also reproducible if manually started while disconnected from the wifi.
creator: dav75uk

title: Firefox crash, Tab crash (always)
content:
I tryed Firefox 115.8.0esr and 115.9.0esr 32Bit on Windows 7. (78.15.0 works) Firefox crashes(the whole program, i mean no tab) on "about:support" or some pages on support.mozilla.org like https://support.mozilla.org/de/kb/firefox-leistungseinstellungen always reproduceable.

I disabled all Addons, i disabled this power optimizion setting, removed usercrome.css same. With Firefox savemode it dont crash. Spyware is blocked, means datareporting/telemetry/ping by disabling the options and empty the urls (like on FF 78 but it dont crash). Somewhere i read firefox can crash on a empty url, but i assume its fixed long time ago. A wrong, unreachable or empty url should not crash on well programming. Think about countrys that blocks urls, adblocker, pihole and so on. I dont remember about what url i read.

Does the savemode revert all about:config settings? What does support.mozilla ask the browser that causes the crash? It know it seems to identify the Browser, but usual its done by useragent and no "internal" communication.

Then FF always crash on ebay.de search if you scroll or change settings while the page is not ready. Spyware is too blocked by Hardware, ebay may wait for some ad? But thats already on FF78 but on 115 it seems more often, this was not with FF 52. But some sites including ebay stops to work with FF52/78 so no choice.
creator: chkamiga

title: Sobre notificações
content: Tenho o Firefox sempre atualizado automaticamente, rodando no Windows 11 Professional (x64), também atualizado. Eu uso as notificações do Firefox ao invés das notificações do Windows. Até cerca de 10 dias atrás, toda notificação que chegava, aparecia uma pequena janela no canto inferior direito, que ficava sobreposta por alguns segundos a todos os programas que eu estivesse usando (p.ex.: uma nova mensagem no WhatsApp Web). Nestes últimos dias essas mesmas notificações aparecem no mesmo local, mas como uma janela selecionável na Barra de Tarefas do Windows, que faz com que a notificação não fique sobreposta se estou usando o mouse em outro programa (ou até mesmo no Firefox). O comportamento da notificação mudou, exigindo que eu busque na Barra de Tarefas do Windows qual notificação recebi. É um comportamento novo e irritante, que tira o sentido da notificação. Como faço para mudar isso? Existe algo nas configurações que eu possa fazer? Ou esse é um comportamento que surgiu com as atualizações (tanto do Firefox, como do Windows)?
creator: fersp

title: Horizontal scroll
content: At one site that I visit daily where multiple pictures sometimes can be scrolled horizontally, I can't scroll down or up with the keyboard. The Page Up/Down keys change their functions and scroll the pictures horizontally instead of making the page scroll up or down. I have to use up/down arrows until I reach a point where there are no multiple lateral pictures to get the expected function from the scroll keys. Is there a setting or other way to prevent horizontal scrolling using the Page Up/Down keys?
creator: thomas@kindbo.com

title: Hackean mi Firefox mediante servidores oficiales de Electronic Arts.
content: Buenos dias, me parece que han hackeado firefox mediante servidores oficiales de Electronic Arts. Solo juego a el juego multijugador Apex Legends y sospecho que los empleados de este juego intentan robar mis datos personales (tokens). Firefox me advirtio, os envio las fotos. Podeis verificar que esto es cierto o decirme que tipo de advertencia me envio Firefox? Os envio las fotos que hice al aviso de mi navegador Firefox. Es la tercera vez que contacto con vosotros y necesito una respuesta por que estoy a la espera de vuestra respuesta para denunciar este asunto en Policia Nacional. Me habeis comunicado dos veces mediante e-mail que vaya al foro de Firefox para comentar este asunto pero es que no encuentro por ningun lugar ese foro. Si quereis que postee este asunto en el foro, enviarme un link directo por e-mail para que pueda postear este asunto. Gracias por la atencion, estare a la espera.
creator: bychoza60

title: Lost Saved Passwords in Firefox; Restored by with Safe Mode; Not Restored in Normal Mode with Adds-on Disabled
content:
I've been using Firefox and it's saved numerous passwords. However, these disappeared suddenly. Through testing, I discovered they reappear when I restart Firefox in Safe Mode (achieved via about:profiles => restart with adds-on disabled). Yet, re-enabling add-ons (restart in normal mode) causes the passwords to vanish again. Interestingly, disabling the add-ons in normal mode doesn't restore password access.

Looking for solutions or insights.
creator: elijahgalahad

title: Configure text-to-speech for reading mode
content:
Hello,

We are adding accessibility features to the Emmabuntüs Debian Edition 5 Linux distribution based on Debian 12, and we would like to use the reading mode included in Firefox to enable smoother voice reading for visually impaired people.

Currently we are going to use the Svox Pico and eSpeak speech synthesis at the same time because in SVox Pico we do not have all the voices we need for our possible users, particularly Portuguese.

We have found how to make the synthesis used by Firefox's reading mode be SVox Pico by default instead of eSpeak, however this requires a modification in the /etc/speech-dispatcher/speechd.conf file.

To do this, simply put the default pico synthesis in this file:

DefaultModule pico

But this causes problems with other software that we intend to use.

We found how to make all the voices of a speech synthesis appear in the Firefox playback menu by going to about:config and doing a search for the word "narrate":

Option narrate

On the other hand, we cannot find how to modify the "narrate.voice" option to tell it to default to pico speech synthesis instead of eSpeak synthesis which is the first synthesis loaded by speech-dispatcher, because we must keep eSpeak as the first synthesis loaded and do not put a default synthesis in speechd.conf to maintain compatibility with software that we wish to use.

Do you have any tips or a manual that explains the possible options for the "narrate.voice" option?

Thanks in advance for your help.
creator: Patrick-Emmabuntus

title: enabling "Efficiency mode"?
content: how do i enable the "Efficiency mode" in the firefox about:config preferences like microsoft edge has?
creator: max.matter01

title: Force Network Monitor show proxy addresses in requests
content:
I'm using PAC file that returns SOCKS5 proxy, however in my Network Monitor I see actual IP addresses rather than proxified. This is contrary to what Chromium does and it makes no sense. I need to know which requests were successfully proxied.

Is there a ay to enforce it or as usual Firefox is 10 years behind Chrome?
creator: kein-of

title: Firefox browser not working with ExpressVPN
content: Macbook Pro, Sonoma 14.1.2. I updated Firefox in the beginning of March. Since then it will not allow me to access site on the internet when I have ExpressVPN enabled. ExpressVPN works with Safari. I have spent over an hour working with a VPN tech. It's fine. The only change was updating Firefox. Since then I have removed and re-installed both Firefox and ExpressVPN. How do I resolve this?
creator: friday.05
